meanings.sent1: The proteinic shake helped him recover after his workout.
meanings.sent2: Her diet includes many proteinic foods like chicken and fish.
meanings.sent3: The proteinic salad was so full of energy, it started doing jumping jacks!
meanings.sent4: His muscles felt like a proteinic fortress, strong and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The proteinic nature of the steak was evident in its juicy tenderness.

meanings.definition: Having the properties of a protein.
meanings.sent1: The proteinic structure of the hair made it strong and shiny.
meanings.sent2: The proteinic nature of the fabric made it stretchy and durable.
meanings.sent3: The proteinic rubber band bounced around like a lively spring.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as proteinic as her positive attitude, infectious and uplifting.
meanings.sent5: The proteinic bond between them was unbreakable, like a chain of strength.

meanings.sent1: The proteinic texture of the tofu made it a great meat substitute.
meanings.sent2: The proteinic smell of the bakery made her crave fresh bread.
meanings.sent3: The proteinic clouds in the sky seemed to be made of fluffy marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a proteinic quality, deep and resonant.
meanings.sent5: The proteinic glow of the sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
